thread.section_title: PACK & SEND Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PACK & SEND Australia | www.packsend.com.au | 2 of 119
thread.title: Michael Ackerie
thread.title_full: PACK & SEND Australia reviewed by Michael Ackerie

author: Michael Ackerie
title: Michael Ackerie
text: Recently had to send several large items using the the self serve option. Was unsure of some details and had excellent over the phone assistance from my local outlet at West End in Brisbane, backed up by friendly no hassle help when i dropped the parcels down. So impressed!
